scripts.docs:build: npm run clean && npx honkit build ./ _book/notes && rsync -av --exclude='.git' home/ _book/ && rm -f _book/service-worker.js
scripts.books:update: if [ -d "book-shelf/.git" ]; then cd book-shelf && git pull origin main; else git clone https://github.com/VikramTiwari/book-shelf book-shelf; fi
scripts.books:build: cd book-shelf && npm install && npx vite build --base=/books/
scripts.home:update: if [ -d "home/.git" ]; then cd home && git pull origin master; else git clone git@github.com:VikramTiwari/vikramtiwari.github.com.git home; fi
scripts.deploy: npm run home:update && npm run books:update && npm run docs:build && npm run books:build && npm run books:deploy-prep && npx firebase-tools deploy --project vik-website
